trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Howell
There were no other sightings in Howell on or around November 2nd 2007
divs: sighting detailsmy wife and i were sitting on our deck watching the sky for shooting stars, it was a very clear night. my wife noticed it first, a triangle, dark in the middle with lights on each point. it appeared out of nowhere and traveled across the sky and over our house at a very high rate of speed. she brought it to my attention and i saw it as well. it was completely silent. the object took about 5 or so seconds to cross the sky and went over the house where we lost site of it. it traveled in a east\south east direction towards the town of brighton. the object appeared to be solid because as it traveled it blotted out stars behind it. hard to tell how big or how high it was due to not having a frame of reference. my guess is that it was about 1,500 to 2,000 feet up. as for size, i'd guess bigger than an airliner. all three lights were white and equidistant to each other. it flew in a straight pattern. i called this sighting into the local sheriff's department.
